textBeforeTable: The following table compares some useful show commands for verifying and troubleshooting multicast network configurations. Verification Command Comparison interface loopback0 description MSDP Peer Address ip address 192.168.1.1/32 interface loopback10 description PIM RP Address ip address 1.1.1.1/32 ip pim rp-address 1.1.1.1 group-list 224.0.0.0/4 ip msdp peer 192.168.2.1 connect-source loopback0 interface Loopback0 description MSDP Peer Address ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.255 interface Loopback10 description PIM RP Address ip address 1.1.1.1 255.255.255.255 ip pim rp-address 1.1.1.1 ip msdp peer 192.168.2.1 connect-source Loopback0 ip msdp cache-sa-state Configuring MSDP (Anycast-RP) vlan 10 ip igmp snooping querier 192.168.10.1 interface Vlan10 ip address 192.168.10.1 255.255.255.0 ip igmp snooping querier Configuring an IGMP Snooping Querier for a VLAN interface Ethernet1/1 ip address 192.168.10.1/24 ip pim sparse-mode ip igmp version 3 interface TenGigabitEthernet1/1 ip address 192.168.10.1 255.255.255.0 ip pim sparse-mode ip igmp version 3 Configuring IGMP Version 3 for an Interface
